question: I did isthiqara about a guy I want to marry and I am unclear about the sign.
answer:
QUESTION
I did isthiqara for marrying a guy. After Isthiqara, in my dream, I had done isthiqara also and I woke up in my dream and talked to 2 of the guy's friends on the phone and they both told me they think it will happen between us because they got dreams and feelings also. I'm like wow, I did isthiqara last night. (This is all in my dream). I also had my grandmother do Isthiqara and she had a dream about white sweets and she wanted to give some to the Prophet (S).
ANSWER


Share:
The indication in the Istikhaara is positive. We advise you also seek the
Mashwara (counsel) of your seniors on the matter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
